title: Vladmir or cassiopeia
body: I have been saving my IP for a while and have finally reached enough to purchase either Vladimir or Cassiopeia.   I like all lanes and I do not mind either AP or AD please could you give me your opinion on which champion I should purchase and which is the funnest overall :)  Thanks a lot!

replies.body:
Well Vladimir is played both top and mid, whereas Cassiopeia is primarily a midlaner.
In my opinion, Vladimir is a much easier champion who is also resourceless.
Cassiopeia requires you to use your spells very effectively, as if you miss your abilities you are vulnerable.
Vladimir is more mobile, and has an escape. He is tankier too due to his passive.
They are both great lane bullies.

In my opinion, Cassiopeia does more damage but is much harder to play.
Cass can be played top lane, she is just so mechanically difficult that she's extremely hard to play anywhere.
I am mainly looking for a top laner
vlad is more fun to play and easier. but i feel cassiopia is more rewarding because of her skill cap
